text:
Hi,

we are using mod_proxy as an outbound proxy and we have a huge list of allowed destination ports. Today we have to list each port and whenever we run into a new business partner with a new port we have to go through the fancy SOX process of getting that added to the production systems.

To us it would be very benefitial to be able to just add a wildcard after the AllowCONNECT directivy to allow any destination port.

Thanks a lot and regards, Hanno
creator: hanno.borns@hp.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 23673 ***
creator: sf@sfritsch.de
